name: Haldor Iron-Hand
description: A massive, muscular man with skin the color of hammered bronze and eyes like molten gold. His left arm is a masterfully crafted iron prosthetic from the elbow down, intricate with copper wiring and small blue World-Spark capacitors. He wears a heavy, singed leather apron over his bare chest, which is etched with smithing-clan tattoos. He holds a massive forging hammer that hums with a low, deep frequency.
bio: A veteran of the Old Deep, Haldor was one of the first to pledge his hammer to King Kaelrath. He lost his left hand to a crawler, replacing it with a self-forged iron gauntlet that he continuously upgrades. He is the technical heart of the Warden Forge, responsible for the creation of the most advanced arcanotech armor.
motivation: To see Emberheart's forge fires burning brighter than the Spires' suns, proving the superiority of Warden-craft.
connection: Kaelrath's primary technical lead in the Warden Forge.
